testimonials.testimonialText: I was so shocked when ComparePower found me a plan that saved $127 on my first month! I had no idea I was overpaying so much. The smart meter analysis made it so easy - I didn't have to guess my usage.
ComparePower's Live Link feature is incredible. It analyzed my actual smart meter data and found a plan that's saving me over $2,000 a year. That's money back in my pocket!
I've been with the same provider for 5 years. ComparePower showed me I was overpaying by $95 every single month. Switching was painless and the savings are real.
The savings calculator was spot-on. They predicted I'd save $1,800 a year, and after 6 months, I'm actually saving even more than that. Highly recommend!
I was skeptical at first, but ComparePower really delivered. My electricity bill dropped by $82 the first month. Over a year, that's almost $1,000 saved!
The smart meter integration is genius. Instead of estimating my usage, ComparePower used my actual data to find the perfect plan. Saving $143/month now!
ComparePower found me a plan that's saving $67 per month. That's almost $800 a year! The process was so simple, I recommended it to all my neighbors.
I thought I already had a good rate. Turns out I was wrong! ComparePower's analysis showed me I could save $112/month. Switched immediately and couldn't be happier.
